review: It works exactly as described on the product page. It attaches onto the bottom of your steering wheel and the pressure of your items holds it in place. One side of the tray has an indentation to hold  a cup and keep it from sliding off the tray and the other side is smooth for either a laptop or tablet, or to use as a writing surface and has a pen or pencil holder. It doesn't look like it would hold a laptop, but it does. Easy to get onto the steering wheel and easy to get off. A great product for home health/hospice nurses or others who work out of their car. I use it to do my charting in my car and not have to sit in my patient's homes and do it. I use it 5 days a week and wonder how I have lived without it.
productTitle: Zone Tech Car Laptop and Food Steering Wheel Tray (Black)
